alert.note: Alert for Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:09PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR STARK AND NORTHEASTERN KNOX COUNTIES... At 409 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Galva to Victoria, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Fayette, Elmira, Toulon, Osceola, Wyoming, Castleton and Bradford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
